stories.original_headline: Scientists tried to break Einstein’s speed of light rule
stories.original_summary: Einstein’s claim that the speed of light is constant has survived more than a century of scrutiny—but scientists are still daring to test it. stories.fantasy_headline: Wizards Challenge Ancient Magic Law of Light's Swiftness!
stories.fantasy_story: Even after centuries, the Grand Wizards still test the ancient decrees of the Arch-Wizard Albus about the unchanging speed of magical light. Some believe at the edges of the cosmos, this light might flicker differently. They track mighty cosmic energies from far-off realms to observe its true nature.

stories.fantasy_headline: Arcane Puzzle: Magical Motes Defy Heating Spells!
stories.fantasy_story: When the Royal Alchemists aimed repeated light spells at an enchanted device, they expected it to overheat and turn chaotic. Surprisingly, the tiny magical motes inside abruptly ceased absorbing arcane power. Instead, they locked into a steady, unmoving pattern, a strange effect due to their magical harmony.

stories.original_headline: Xbox’s Towerborne is switching from a free-to-play game to a paid one
stories.original_summary: Towerborne, a side-scrolling action RPG published by Xbox Game Studios that has been available in early access, will officially launch on February 26th. stories.fantasy_headline: Renowned Saga "Towerborne" Now Requires Gold for Viewing!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Guild of Enchanted Tales announced that "The Chronicle of Towerborne," a popular adventure saga, will soon be available. Originally, it was meant to be a freely shared scroll, accessible across the ether-webs. However, the Guild now declares that access will require a payment of gold coins, offering a more private viewing.

stories.original_headline: The best Apple Watch to buy
stories.original_summary: If you have an iPhone, the Apple Watch is the best smartwatch for you. But there was only one Apple Watch when the smartwatch launched in 2015. stories.fantasy_headline: Choosing Your Perfect Enchanted Time-Teller for the Scrying Mirror!
stories.fantasy_story: For those who possess an enchanted scrying mirror, a magical wrist-orb is the finest companion. Years ago, there was but one kind of time-teller available. Now, skilled craftsmen offer three distinct versions: the Simple Orb for beginners, the Grand Series for everyday use, and the Hardy Orb for adventurers.
